titles.title: Recognizing May 2, 2008, as the 88th anniversary of the first National Negro League baseball game.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/4/2008--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the 88th anniversary of the first National Negro League baseball game; and (2) the teams and players of the Negro Baseball Leagues for their achievements, dedication, sacrifices, and contributions.
